text: @hilarybennmp @danielmgmoylan But it's not a problem for employees, they already collect passport data as mandatory ID for job applicants, just mean they need to double check & record person 'date & eligibility status' against HMRC data. Step process  in #immigration & #employment #compliance

text:
@danielmgmoylan The job application 'data collection policy' to distinguish UK EU & non-UK citizens has been enforced since early 90s, everyone has to go through same process no one is exempt. Don't know Hilary Benn is highlighting it as an issue

text: @ecJulie @danielmgmoylan .The problem for employers will be having to distinguish between two people who both have EU passports, but where only one of them has the right to work because they were here before a No Deal Brexit.
